```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment = NA,
                      options(digits = 3, scipen = 999))
library(tidyverse)
library(plm)
library(stargazer)
df <- # data
  here::here("data", "covid_data_final.csv") %>% 
  read_csv()

sc_names <-
  df %>%
  names() 

soc_cap_measures <- sc_names[c(14:17, 46:64)]
```

# Table 1

```{r table-1, results='asis'}
stargazer(
  df %>%
    lm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2) +
        median_household_income +
        percent_adults_with_ba +
        percent_in_fair_or_poor_health +
        percent_black +
        density +
        percent_rural +
        percent_65 +
        average_temperature +
        governor_political_affiliation,
      data = .
    ),
  
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2),
      data = .,
      effect = "time",
      index = "state",
      model = "within"
    ),
  
  df %>%
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index +
        I(stringency_index_lag ^ 2) +
        median_household_income +
        percent_adults_with_ba +
        percent_in_fair_or_poor_health +
        percent_black +
        density +
        percent_rural +
        percent_65 +
        average_temperature +
        governor_political_affiliation,
      data = .,
      effect = "time",
      index = "state",
      model = "within"
    ),
  df %>% 
    plm(
      cases_new ~ stringency_index_lag * state_level_index + 
        I(stringency_index_lag^2),
      data = .,
      effect = "twoways",
      index = "state",
      method = "withing"
    ),
  type = "html"
)

```
